title: 空岛插件如何在 计分板和 DeluxeChat 上使用变量
author: love12138
txt_content: 找不到变量，mcbbs搬运帖给的变量无法使用。

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
下载https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/placeholderapi.6245/
安到服务端
输入papi ecloud download ASkyBlock
如果是USkyblock就输入papi ecloud download USkyblock
然后papi reload
ASkyBlock(top)
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/askyblock.1220/
Expansion download command: /papi ecloud download ASkyBlock

%askyblock_level%
%askyblock_island_y%
%askyblock_island_z%
%askyblock_island_world%
%askyblock_team_size%
%askyblock_coop_islands%
%askyblock_has_island%
%askyblock_owner%
